## Loading and preprocessing the data
data <- read.csv("activity.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ',', colClasses = c("numeric", "character","integer"))
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
data$date <- ymd(data$date)
str(data)
head(data)
steps <- data %>%
  filter(!is.na(steps)) %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarize(steps = sum(steps)) %>%
  print
